description: It's moving day! Some of my muscled friends came to help me move a couple of my old pieces of furniture out of the house. Zack, Calvin and Brad brought a buddy with them that I'd never seen before, Campo. It didn't take long for me to offer him an improvised masked scene on the spot while his 3 partners were taking a break in the backyard. This bad boy had fun performing and showing off. He made it very clear that he is not gay but he likes sex a lot. He let me touch his muscles... That's a start! Despite his young age, he's already had a lot of various experiences with older partners, group sex and so on. Besides going to the gym from time to time, he's a really good soccer player and likes to play hockey during the winter. He's been complimented often on his beautiful smile and gorgeous eyes. I personally complimented him on his beautiful uncut cock. The way he slowly stroked it, bringing the skin on top of his shaft, was exciting to watch. So that's reality shooting at its best. Please enjoy Campo!
title: Campo, Scene #01
